justification: Rationale centers on A’s volatility concerns and ignores B’s conservative, consensus-trusting mindset. It doesn’t reference B’s urgency, preference for possession receivers, or comfort buying low on injuries. While Justin Miller (Tier 1, minor Q) could entice B, the explanation doesn’t show that reasoning. Claiming an upgrade at TE is dubious (Ethan Turner is Tier 4; A already has a Tier 3 TE). The trade is feasible and could be acceptable on value, but ToM reasoning and clarity are weak.
